bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names ge yong 膈壅 , diaphragm obstruction. Illness Sign of a feeling of distension, fullness, and congestion in the chest and diaphragm region. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang 羊 quoting Duo neng bi shi Book on agriculture. Ming era. 多能鄙事 治老人胸滿痞塞，食飲不下 , “To cure old people with fullness and blockage in their chest who are unable to passdown food and beverages”. writes: 老人膈痞，不下飲食 , “When old people have a diaphragm obstacle-illness they are unable to pass down beverages and food”.
